title: tools/container/intsets does not properly support gccgo
body:
Please answer these questions before submitting your issue. Thanks!

1. What version of Go are you using (`go version`)?

1.4.2 (go) in GCC (5.3.0) 

2. What operating system and processor architecture are you using (`go env`)?

Various. 

3. Explain the issue?

Attempted to build [graph from gonum](https://godoc.org/github.com/gonum/graph), which produced the following error while building dependencies: 

    imports golang.org/x/tools/container/intsets: C source files not allowed when not using cgo: popcnt_gccgo_c.c
